name: Eldlixir of the Glorious Golden Land
text:
You can pay 800 LP, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Zombie/LIGHT/Level 10/ATK 1500/DEF 2800) (this card is also still a Trap), then if you control "Eldlich the Golden Lord", you can return 1 monster from the field to the hand.
● Set 1 of your banished "Golden Land" or "Eldlixir" Spells/Traps.
You can only use this effect of "Eldlixir of the Glorious Golden Land" once per turn.
